name: Adventure Tours
description: Exciting tours filled with adventure activities like hiking, rafting, and camping.

name: City Tours
description: Explore the vibrant cities with guided tours covering major landmarks and attractions.

name: Cultural Tours
description: Immerse yourself in the rich culture and heritage of different regions with cultural tours.

name: Beach Holidays
description: Relax and unwind on pristine beaches with beach holiday packages.

name: Wildlife Safaris
description: Embark on thrilling wildlife safaris to encounter exotic animals in their natural habitats.

name: Historical Tours
description: Journey through history with guided tours of ancient ruins, monuments, and historical sites.

name: Cruise Vacations
description: Set sail on luxurious cruises to explore multiple destinations with all-inclusive amenities.

name: Food and Wine Tours
description: Indulge in culinary delights and exquisite wines with food and wine tours around the world.

name: Mountain Expeditions
description: Challenge yourself with mountain expeditions and trekking adventures in breathtaking landscapes.

name: Family Holidays
description: Create unforgettable memories with family-friendly holiday packages designed for all ages.
